title: Blood Red Throne - Altered Genesis (2005)
description:
Personally, this is my favorite album by Blood Red Throne.  Between the exuberant scenes of gore and agony, depicted ever so vulgarly through song, and the extreme torrent of hatred that one cannot help feel run through one&#039;s veins; this is an amazing album.  If you like Death Metal and you&#039;ve not downloaded this album, either:
A) Kill Yourself
B) Download it immediately

Don&#039;t forget to seed.
